```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyboot)
d <- read_csv('./sample_sentences_diff_10.csv') %>%
     bind_rows(read_csv('./sample_sentences_same_10.csv'))

d %>%
  mutate(sampling_sites = str_squish(gsub("[[:punct:]]", "", sampling_sites))) %>%
  separate(sampling_sites, into = c('first_site', 'second_site')) %>%
  mutate(first_site = as.numeric(first_site), second_site = as.numeric(second_site)) %>%
  mutate(distance_between_sites = abs(second_site - first_site)) %>%
  group_by(distance_between_sites) %>%
  tidyboot_mean(abs(diff)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = distance_between_sites, y = empirical_stat)) +
    geom_point() +
    geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = ci_lower, ymax = ci_upper), width = 0)
```
